name: John Cusack
summary: John Cusack. Actor: Grosse Pointe Blank. John Cusack is, like most of his characters, an unconventional hero. Wary of fame and repelled by formulaic Hollywood fare, he has built a successful career playing underdogs and odd men out--all the while avoiding the media spotlight. John was born in Evanston, Illinois, to an Irish-American family. With the exception of mom Nancy (née Carolan), a former math teacher, the Cusack clan is...
awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Award | 8 wins & 21 nominations total
